title: NScrollAreaProps
description: Neuron scroll area component for custom-styled scrollable containers. Provides consistent cross-browser scrollbar styling.

orientation.description: Direction(s) in which the content can scroll.

maxHeight.description: Maximum height of the scroll area (CSS value, e.g. '400px', '50vh').

maxWidth.description: Maximum width of the scroll area (CSS value, e.g. '600px', '100%').

className.description: Additional CSS class names to apply.
